Structs/ErrorInfo.html#/s:19VisualRecogn.name: description
Structs/ErrorInfo.html#/s:19VisualRecogn.abstract: Human-readable error description. For example, File size limit exceeded.

Structs/ClassifierResult.html#/s:19Visua.name: classifierID
Structs/ClassifierResult.html#/s:19Visua.abstract: ID of a classifier identified in the image.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: classifierID
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: ID of a classifier identified in the image.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: owner
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Unique ID of the account who owns the classifier. Might not be returned by some requests.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: coreMLEnabled
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Whether the classifier can be downloaded as a Core ML model after the training status is ready.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: explanation
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: If classifier training has failed, this field might explain why.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: created
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Date and time in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that the classifier was created.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: retrained
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Date and time in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that the classifier was updated. Might not be returned by some

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: updated
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Date and time in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that the classifier was most recently updated. The field matches

Structs/ClassifiedImages.html#/s:19Visua.name: customClasses
Structs/ClassifiedImages.html#/s:19Visua.abstract: Number of custom classes identified in the images.

Structs/ClassifiedImages.html#/s:19Visua.name: imagesProcessed
Structs/ClassifiedImages.html#/s:19Visua.abstract: Number of images processed for the API call.

Structs/ClassifiedImages.html#/s:19Visua.name: warnings
Structs/ClassifiedImages.html#/s:19Visua.abstract: Information about what might cause less than optimal output. For example, a request sent with a corrupt .zip file

Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.name: sourceURL
Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.abstract: Source of the image before any redirects. Not returned when the image is uploaded.

Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.name: resolvedURL
Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.abstract: Fully resolved URL of the image after redirects are followed. Not returned when the image is uploaded.

Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.name: image
Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.abstract: Relative path of the image file if uploaded directly. Not returned when the image is passed by URL.

Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.name: error
Structs/ClassifiedImage.html#/s:19Visual.abstract: Information about what might have caused a failure, such as an image that is too large. Not returned when there is

Structs/ClassResult.html#/s:19VisualReco.name: score
Structs/ClassResult.html#/s:19VisualReco.abstract: Confidence score for the property in the range of 0 to 1. A higher score indicates greater likelihood that the

Structs/ClassResult.html#/s:19VisualReco.name: typeHierarchy
Structs/ClassResult.html#/s:19VisualReco.abstract: Knowledge graph of the property. For example, /fruit/pome/apple/eating apple/Granny Smith. Included only if

Structs/ClassResult.html.name: ClassResult
Structs/ClassResult.html.abstract: Result of a class within a classifier.

Structs/Classifiers.html.name: Classifiers
Structs/Classifiers.html.abstract: A container for the list of classifiers.

Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.abstract: The default HTTP headers for all requests to the service.
